name: Refugee Waves
description:
A trainee in Defense and International Management will have to deal with the refugee crisis. How will he manage the situation?

Install instructions

Step 1: download Refugee Waves.rar.

Step 2: unzip it.

Step 3: double click the .exe.

Step 4: enjoy!
